website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for the most power and longterm use, look no further than the Dyson. The Small Ball is their best value product.
pros: The easy-to-maneuver head is a huge plus
Dyson has top quality customer support should anything go wrong with your vacuum
cons: Heavy – not great for carrying up and down stairs

customer_reviews.title: They don’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Dyson ball I've owned. The first one stopped rotating, and I spent money to have it repaired. It stopped again. I got a new vacuum. I got the same model because I really like the way it cleans and handles. Less than one year later the same thing has happened. Now I’m going to go with a less expensive type of vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: mjeannep

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum sucks hard, but there are some drawbacks.
customer_reviews.text: The suction is unreal. But you pay a premium for the brand. The attachments are sparse and no retractible cord. Seriously? It's 2018 and $300 can't buy you a vacuum with a retractible cord? Anyway, it does what it needs to do even if you do have to unwrap the entire cord before you can use the accessory hose. And it fits in our small-ish place.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vacuum so far
customer_reviews.text: Awesome vacuum so far. It picks up everything that my old Dirt Devil couldn't. I have been eyeing Dyson vacuums for years but couldn't convince myself to spend more than $100 on any vacuum. I was getting really lazy about vacuuming the house as my old vacuum was on its final legs after two decades of use. Well, the Dyson small ball has made cleaning an exciting experience as I can literally see all of the particulates and hair being picked up into the transparent canister. Now, I feel like I'm on a mission to get the whole house in order!
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: It's light weight and is unbelievably powerful. I can't believe what it sucks out of the carpets. Easily cleans hard flooring with the push of a button. Telescoping handle makes it easy to store. Canister pops open to empty so you don't have to touch a thing. Filter is easy to access and clean. I love it! 2019 UPDATE: While I love the way it cleans, I've had so many plastic parts fall off. It really needs to be made our of better quality materials. Like more metal. Especially around the bottom. Not sure if I'd buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Loux Dba Vintage

customer_reviews.title: If you have a small apartment and no rugs you might not be disappointed but then again you just as well buy a ...
customer_reviews.text: Too small, difficult to do rugs/throws. I purchased in May and here in December I have had issues with it losing suction. I was against ordering a dyson, I had all the experience I needed from the one my boyfriend previously owned but was told that was a first model and they have come a long way and convinced to try again. My answer remains the same - never again. If you have a small apartment and no rugs you might not be disappointed but then again you just as well buy a battery operated one.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: To Be Expected
customer_reviews.text: I just received my vacuum last night, so this is just my initial response. Setup was easy and took about 2 minutes. I tried the 'sweep a clean carpet' advertisement gimmick, and sure enough, it picked up a plenty of dirt. The vacuum is quite light, easy to carry, and the long cord will be very nice. Probably my favorite feature is the ability to open up the casing around the roller head. My Shark did not have this, and cleaning the head took a significant amount of effort. I'll continue to update as I put her through the paces, but so far I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Haystack

customer_reviews.title: Works great on animal hair.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is easy to use. When I bought this I had three dogs and three cats staying in my home. I had to empty it two or three times the first time I used it. So much animal hair. That being said it work very well keeping up with all the animals. Luckily four of the animals went to their new home and this vacuum still works great just for my dog and cat. It's pretty quiet for a vacuum also. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Suction power
customer_reviews.text: Very portable, easy to move around the area. Easy to empty the collection bin. I moved into a new house that had some carpeted areas and it picked up an amazing amount of material on the first use. The air quality and smell of my living area has improved noticeably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time. At first it did not work ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. At first it did not work well but my wife called the manufacturer and they guided her over the phone how to reassemble the pickup end and now it works very well on both surfaces (tile & carpet). Thanks to the manufacturer help line.
customer_reviews.author: Fahim Shaikh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vacuum for once a week cleaning . Perfect size and it works well .
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great design and function
customer_reviews.text: It is a well designed product, and has different options on the suction power. It is easy to use on the wood floor. For small spaces, it can be left out as interior decoration instead of hiding it in closet.
customer_reviews.author: peiheng tsai

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum you need to get it
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum it picks up so much dirt as soon as I turn it on a bunch of cat hair and dog hair started coming out of my carpet for a tiny machine this has big-time suction power I seriously recommend this I recommend it to my friends and if you’re looking for a vacuum this is the one you need if you’re looking for a light vacuum like if you have a bad back this is a vacuum you need
customer_reviews.author: LVentrello

customer_reviews.title: Best apartment vacuum for beasts
customer_reviews.text: Handles my apartment like a champ. I have an old English Sheepdog and a long haired cat and this thing handles all the hair and dirt on the rugs without a sweat. Easy to store away due to it's small size.
customer_reviews.author: SquarePaw

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic on hard wood floors
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic on hard wood floors. difficult to maneuver on large carpets, and impossible on small carpets such as hall runners. attachments are subpar for a Dyson product. hose and nozzle are difficult to use. I would gladly trade for the old Rainbow vacuum with the carpet beater...
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Ranson

customer_reviews.title: Not as powerful as I expected. Doesn't hold much ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as powerful as I expected. Doesn't hold much dirt. Have to empty very often. Wish I would have gotten the larger one. Just picked it for the weight because I was switching from an Oreck.
customer_reviews.author: Lexistim

customer_reviews.title: I am now a dyson believer!
customer_reviews.text: i was a hater because of how expensive these things are. got it on sale and man its amazing!
customer_reviews.author: rhariz21

customer_reviews.title: Works, but parts worn out when received
customer_reviews.text: For a factory refurbished model, I was a bit disappointed that they didn’t Even replace the roller. There were complete bald spots on it with no bristles. It works well, but not sure it’s worth the money when you immediately have to start replacing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalobwana

customer_reviews.title: Hate it
customer_reviews.text: I had the Dyson Animal for years and it was awesome. This is a pain to use and not worth the money. Suction is not that great and to use the extender hose, you have stop and take things apart and put together. With the animal model, you just pull it out and start using it. So disappointed in this model. Would not recommend that you spend this kind of money on this model.
customer_reviews.author: Gotoole

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product. It is a vacuum that does not ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. It is a vacuum that does not vacum. Bought it a few months back. Does not suck any thing!
customer_reviews.author: Sulatha Dwarakanath

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick carpets
customer_reviews.text: If your carpet is of good quality and is thick, this vacuum will not work. It will be stuck in one place and impossible to push. I emailed dyson and they told me to take the spinning brush out. This didn't help and I'm stuck with a vacuum that I can't use. Very frustrating and received no help from the company. Wouldn't recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A smaller powerful Vac, this is it.
customer_reviews.text: Great for an apartment, very compact, powerful and easy to use, what more can I say? Oh yeh, the cord is super long so you do not have to keep finding a different outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I received this unit Saturday it is our third dyson upright. Returned it today Monday, it just did not pick up dust. We are very disappointed. When we received the unit the parts were just thrown into a box, very unprofessional.
customer_reviews.author: I Spend Too Much

customer_reviews.title: Dyson Small Ball
customer_reviews.text: Great on hard floors. YOU SHOULD NOT USE BEATER BAR ON CARPETS ACCORDING TO DIRECTIONS WHICH IS WHERE YOU USUALLY USE BEATER BAR. Many small plastic parts on dust bin. A lot of dust when emptying. VERY HARD to push on rugs with beater bar off.
customer_reviews.author: Pashado

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum!! It works great going from hard wood to rugs to carpet. Best one I've ever had
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Haseleu

customer_reviews.title: It maneuvers really great.
customer_reviews.text: This works find in a 1 Bedroom Apartment. We had another one that we got when they first cam out, at least 10 years or more. With this one is smaller and light weight, which works for the older generation. It maneuvers really great.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Levell

customer_reviews.title: Its Mighty Mighty
customer_reviews.text: Its light weight and Mighty Mighty !!! When you get older or have an issue with a heavy vacuum this is the one you want it cleans like the full size one but only weighs 12.15 lbs cant beat it
customer_reviews.author: Virginia B.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this mini-model after 4+ yrs with the Dyson Animal. Canister is way too small so we are constantly emptying it. Suction not as good. Smaller, lightweight model so better for stairs. Spend the extra $$$ and buy the larger model!
customer_reviews.author: Mtn Girl!

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum literally sucks it up
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum literally sucks it up! I had the canister filled before I finished vacuuming my bedroom and by the time I finished some other areas, I had to empty it yet again. Thanks Mr. Dyson for engineering a product that really works!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey deWispelaere

customer_reviews.title: The suction is so strong that it doesn't move easily over a very low pile industrial-style carpet
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work as well as a previous model I own. The suction is so strong that it doesn't move easily over a very low pile industrial-style carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: So good I came back for another
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is very easy to get into tight places. Doesn't weigh much so you don't tire out before the job is done. Suction is excellent so you finish faster. This is my 2nd Dyson purchase & I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Dyson Small Ball Vacuum easy to reach around legs.
customer_reviews.text: The Dyson Small Ball Multi Floor Upright Vacuum Cleaner has been performing well this first month I've owned it. I found it fairly easy to assemble by following included instructions. When I use the hose with attachments to clean furniture or corners, under floorboards, etc. I find it a bit awkward as the long tube attachment doesn't fit into the hose tube tightly. Could I be doing this incorrectly?
customer_reviews.author: Geretma1

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is great for wood floors and runners. note that it is very hard to use on thick carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Ferita

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I started vacuuming with it for the first time and the belt broke. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Sergei G.

customer_reviews.title: Can't be without a Dyson
customer_reviews.text: Moved to a smaller house, put in hardware floors---so no carpet and tried to switch to a Shark to save $. Ended up leaving that one in the garage and replacing with this Dyson on Amazon. If you want clean floors it must be a Dyson in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: M. Passolt

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Very light and small to fit in a closet and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good for floors, not for hand tools
customer_reviews.text: Works good, easy to maneuver and empty. Do not like the way the hose keeps pulling back while using the hand tools.... very annoying
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum! This is my second Dyson, and I can't see myself purchasing any other vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this sweeper! Should have gotten one years ago!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Hudson Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum does not work well. I had a dyson prior to this one which worked well and lasted about 10 years before it stopped working. This one doesn’t properly pick up all small debris and the rug function stopped working. I plan on returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Caso

customer_reviews.title: Product is very tiny compare to picture
customer_reviews.text: Product doesn't match with picture. It's very small in size compare to picture. I don't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anwar

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: My home has never been so clean!! Thank you Dyson!
customer_reviews.author: Zakb03

customer_reviews.title: Good for a smaller size home.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I anticipated, so I'll need to empty it more often but that's okay because it's very easy to do. My old model that was much bigger finally stopped working after +10 years, and it was a refurbished model.
customer_reviews.author: CURTIS W HORTON

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and light . Does a good job and easy to empty .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst vacuum ever...so disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This may be the WORST vacuum I’ve ever owned. It doesn’t suck anything. Lint, dog hair, nothing. I’ve never been so disappointed and annoyed with a purchase ever.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty huge disappointment. For a pricey vacuum I was hoping for a lot more suction.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Not a great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I was told this is a new generation of Dyson but nobody is impressed including the repair center. I’ve had nothing but trouble with this machine. It was repaired once and I’m taking it in again because it is nearly impossible to push on a rug. It’s a small machine and it shouldn’t be that hard. I’m thinking of trading it in for another vacuum. I’d return it if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: It's all that
customer_reviews.text: Still a little heavier than I recall, and drags a bit on carpet; but boy-howdy does it pick up the dirt!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Fazio, Freelance Copyeditor

customer_reviews.text: I have never used my new Dyson and never will, but my cleaning lady loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhoda Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I just assembled it and it was fantastic so far.
customer_reviews.author: Shaymaa

customer_reviews.title: asembly and use
customer_reviews.text: The Dyson was very difficult to assemble. very time consuming. the product is not good for a commercial application as we had hoped . It would be best for residential application as I'm sure it was intended.,
customer_reviews.author: G.Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!!
customer_reviews.text: Great small upright vacuum that sucks like the devil! Excellent machine!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: it is very compact
customer_reviews.text: this is a great vaccume it is easy to manuver and is very easy to store and is light weight also this vaccume has great suckshon
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with it! My mom wanted this all along! We got a great deal during thanksgiving weekend! Couldn't beat the price
customer_reviews.author: Edo Brisku

customer_reviews.title: Assembling the machine
customer_reviews.text: I am not so mechanical. Words telling how to assemble the machine would have helped me more than the pictures. But I got it, just the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It performs like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I use it all the time. It performs like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Downey

customer_reviews.title: Great machine. Very powerful and easy to move around
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Very powerful and easy to move around. Very flexible. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S. Gingras

customer_reviews.title: My mom likes it...But I'm not sold
customer_reviews.text: My mom likes it...But I'm not sold! For the price, i feel the quality could be a lot better. I honestly feel you are paying for the name with this one. It is cheaply made and its evident when you use it. I do not trust many of the reviews on here for this product. Maybe they are like my mom and are only sold by the name. I have a much cheaper vacuum personally and I feel its much better! Buy this for the name, not for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tim The Champ

customer_reviews.title: this is small
customer_reviews.text: To small after havbing the animal also did not like paying 40 dollars for restock fee.
customer_reviews.author: Dianah Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Not good at picking up pet hair and difficult to get the hair out once it's vacuumed. Pass on this.
customer_reviews.author: Sean OBrien

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Suction is second to none. Love this vacuum, will never buy another brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily Overheats
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum will run for about 5-7 minutes then overheats and stop working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have several Hoozers considered best in Consumer Guide but none compared
customer_reviews.text: Meets and beats all my expectatiions. I have several Hoozers considered best in Consumer Guide but none compared. Thanx Dyson
customer_reviews.author: George C. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Need to return
customer_reviews.text: I Ned to return it my mom came out of the hospital and can not push it
customer_reviews.author: colleen klink

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Bought on march 24 broke on June 22. The brush motor quit working. I believe it got small rocks in it and burnt it up. I think the vacuum is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Rueckert

customer_reviews.title: Non functioning
customer_reviews.text: When I went to use it, the vacuum would not suck anything up!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Gray

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the vacuum cleaner to be lighter in weight and easier on my back to clean with.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gottler

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 10 months ago and I should have returned it. It gets clogged up very easily, overheats when used on carpets and doesn’t pick up anything bigger than dust. I hate this vacuum cleaner! It is an absolute waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Ketola

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I don't have luck with cheap vacuums so I thought I'd go the Dyson route. See how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is what happens when you earn a 'C' in mechanical engineering and then design a vacuum cleaner...
customer_reviews.text: Motor exhaust blows in FRONT of the vacuum. Causes light dirt on bare floors to move away from the vacuum as you aim to suck it up. Very annoying game of chase. Problem worse on left side. Hack: It's possible to carve out a plastic nub on the exhaust filter and rotate it 180 degrees. It's not as firmly fixed in place - may rotate and loosen. But at least the exhaust blows behind the vacuum now. If working toward the dirt ( where you can see it ) this area behind the vacuum would be clean already and the wind storm not as problematic.
customer_reviews.author: (Work) E.

customer_reviews.title: So so....
customer_reviews.text: I don't love this vacuum but I don't hate it. I thought Dyson's were supposed to be so awesome, but this one is not. It's an average vacuum cleaner. And it's not designed so well.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a perfect size and weight for me.Does a super job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to push on carpet. Construction was cheap. Felt more like a discount vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Tim overzat

customer_reviews.title: Less a review, but a question to others here...
customer_reviews.text: Installed a whole house vacuum system in new construction, 1980.. Still working great, suction power such that my husband would warn me, as "do not stick a hand in THERE, I am NOT coming to pull your remnants out of either pipes or holding canister in the garage"... Ok, question, could never understand why these whole-house central vac systems NEVER caught on.. Last, but not least, this Dyson baby is totally impressive, for small jobs. Cat hair, cobwebs, that I cannot even see, until I dump the contents!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Christina Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum, at a more than competitive price... Received the vacuum within two days and they followed up to see if I was happy with the purchase. Great customer service. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Ok - works good.
customer_reviews.text: Alot of money to pay for something that doesn't come with a larger capacity dust collection.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, light and compact. The hose is a bit cumbersome to use but it sure sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Julianlobato

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a birthday present but the box is mangled, hopefully contents are okay....
customer_reviews.author: Ryan T.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work any better than a 80 dollar vacuum!! Returned it a bought a cheep one.
customer_reviews.author: idipps

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: If they had said without manual I would not placed this order. I MEAN REALLY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reviews kept me skeptical at first.
customer_reviews.text: Unlike some of the other reviews that say their vacuum doesn’t work well on carpet, I have had no issues. I was skeptical at first as some said the older versions were better, which is why it took me a while to pull the trigger. Then the cleaning head went out on my DC24 after 7 years. Cleaning heads are about $75. Went ahead and spent the extra $$$ for a new version of the vacuum. Very identical in design, the upgraded head and more powerful suction definitely picked up what my old machine wouldn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum does not suck up dirt, it just sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Worst and most expensive vacuum that I have ever owned. This vacuum gets clogged a minimum of three times everytime I use it, it constantly over heats, and it decides when it wants to turn on. They claim that it is the most powerful light weight vacuum but it can't pick up a popcorn kernel. I have to go back after I use it and pick things up by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn LaFramboise

customer_reviews.title: faulty brush
customer_reviews.text: it would be perfect except f that on occasion after using the hose and trying to use it on the carpet, the roller brush fails to engage. I have to keep fooling with it until I can get it to work. I can't figure out any procedure to fix this. I hope it doesn't get worse
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cook

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last but a few days
customer_reviews.text: We plugged it all up. And we could smell like a faint burnt smell. Then a couple days later it smokes. Called there so called customer support Proffesionals and they was absolutely no help. Said it was our fault that it was probably clogged up. It wasn’t at all. There wasn’t even a hair or anything in it. Waste of money. Ended up going to Wal mart and buying a different brand. Been using for about 3 months now and it’s still going. I just feel like I got burned on this deal. Waste of my hard earned money
customer_reviews.author: Chris Thompson

customer_reviews.title: You could get injured trying to push this vacuum over plush carpeting.
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this vacuum. It does not put together like any other vacuum that I have ever owned. It is not able to be pushed over my plush carpet. I tried the fix that was sent to me by the online support person. I had to remove a little black seal on the plate. A little easier to push, but it is still very difficult.This product was highly recommended by a certain company that rates products. This item should say in large letters "Cannot be used on high quality plush carpeting".
customer_reviews.author: Milton B. Resh

customer_reviews.title: Not Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this product. I was looking forward to this vacuum more than an adult should, but it was a total fail. The cord is not retractable, and while that may not seem like a big deal, it actually is considering the length of this cord. The machine is heavy and hard to maneuver in general, but especially around corners. It's mechanism to release the handle is located in a place where you are constantly grabbing it. Did not meet my expectations at all. I returned this immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Cruz-Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Last
customer_reviews.text: Loved this vacuum the first couple of months. It did a great job picking pet hair off carpet that other vacuums missed. Unfortunately, it didn't last. Rotating brush doesn't engage; hose makes a high pitched squeal; dirt and pet hair get stuck in upper part of bin near the filter rather than falling down to the bottom, forcing me to stick my hand up there to pull everything out. It now takes numerous passes to pick up dirt and pet hair. I went from loving this vacuum to hating it. Already in the market for a new one. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: This one is great. Light and cleans like a Dyson
customer_reviews.text: Neck problems prevents me from using a heavy vacuum. I had to give up my full size Dyson. This one is great. Light and cleans like a Dyson!
customer_reviews.author: rmot

customer_reviews.title: Totally Disappointed :-/
customer_reviews.text: I fell for the hype that Dyson is better than other vacuums. This little vacuum is no match for my 3 year old Shark Professional, and I wish I would have bought another Shark instead. Only positive is that it is super light, and that the hose and attachments is self contained. The dust cup is too small so it has to be emptied often. Might be good for a little apartment with no pets and little dust, but not good for bigger spaces. Its now my "upstairs" vacuum, and my Shark is my main "downstairs" vacuum. Buy a Shark instead
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Effortless Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Dyson. Family loves it- light weight and does excellent cleaning job..
customer_reviews.author: 7PaalKap

customer_reviews.title: Quality not as good as my older Dyson
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an 11 year old Dyson that I had. This one isn't as nice as the one I had. I don't know that I would buy another Dyson. At a minimum I am going to try other vacuums when it is time to replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: blueoceanfaith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my tiny space
customer_reviews.text: Granted, I don't have any pets, so I just need a vacuum that can pick up my hair and dust. This Dyson fits the bill. It's the second Dyson ball mini I've purchased over the years-- definitely an improvement over the older model from the early 2000's. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Hate this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I would give it zero stars if I could. The beater bar constantly stops working. I will have to stop at least twice to take out a small piece of hair or lint!!!! I keep it scrupulously clean and yet it takes me half the afternoon to finish vacuuming my living room. I am so sick of this vacuum and will never purchase a Dyson again!! Way overpriced and not worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L. Hanberg

customer_reviews.title: sucked up a lot of dust that my electrolux left ...
customer_reviews.text: it arrived quickly after i ordered. it is very powerful, sucked up a lot of dust that my electrolux left in the carpet. The head works well and its relative soft so when it bumps into the wall it does not seem to leave a mark. I should have bought a larger one since the bin was full before I finished a medium bedroom. Wish the retractable tubing were a bit longer so I can use it to vac the countertop in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jbrook

customer_reviews.title: Dyson is the greatest
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 2 vacuum cleaners in my lifetime. This one being my second. Let me just say, they have a lifetime customer. Amazing! They are pricey but well worth it I must say. I wish I got the next size up. Still great but need to empty out the container more often. That's all.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia O'neal

customer_reviews.title: It is lightweight and versatile.
customer_reviews.text: It has great suction and there is no need to change heads for different floor surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as my old dyson upright
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as my old dyson upright. Has great suction but sometimes the roller stops working. I detach the suction head and reattach and it works again.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Wiese

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a missing head/cleaner, how is this even possible??? :(
customer_reviews.author: Hiram Farrera

customer_reviews.title: its too pricey and too loud. buy it used if possible, but yes, buy it.
customer_reviews.text: overpriced for the performance im seeing. it sucks up everything. suction is great. the whole thing needs to be tilted to atleast a 45 degree angle before the brush begins its powered spinning. its literally louder than my jet powered prop plane. almost loud enough to need hearing protection, i use my sleeping earplugs when i vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research and finally decided on Dyson Small Ball for my smallish home w/ hardwood floors and 1 area rug. I love this vacuum! It is powerful enough to dust my hardwood floors. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed and highly recommend this vacuum!! It’s lightweight, easy to maneuver and sucks up an unbelievable amount of dirt. The vacuum automatically shut off when the canister was full which was a nice surprise. It was very easy emptying the canister. I haven’t used the attachments yet but don’t anticipate any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Wilson

product_meta.title: Dyson Small Ball Multi Floor Upright Vacuum Cleaner, Iron/Yellow
product_meta.description: Size:Small| Color:Iron/YellowThe Dyson Small Ball upright has the most powerful suction of any lightweight vacuum¹. It weighs just 12.15 lbs., so it’s easier to carry around the home and lift up stairs. With a retractable handle, it takes up to 50% less storage space than a full-size upright vacuum. The self-adjusting cleaner head automatically seals in suction across carpets and hard floors. It’s also has carbon fiber filaments on the brush bar, so it captures fine dust from hard floors while the direct drive motor pushes bristles deeper into carpets for a more thorough clean. Dyson’s patented Ball technology means it’s easy to maneuver around furniture and obstacles. It includes a 5 year warranty covering parts and labor.
feature_bullets: Capacity (volume) - .12 gallon. Weighs just 12.15lbs. Suction Power 150AW ; Recommended Surface Application: Carpet, Hard Floor, Multi-surface, Hardwood
Retractable handle saves up to 50 percent more storage space than a full-size upright
Advanced self-adjusting cleaner head Seals in suction across all floors
2 Tier Radial cyclones increase airflow to capture Fine dust, and carbon fiber filaments remove Fine dust from hard floors
Ball technology for easier steering ; cord, wand and hose extend to 42 Inch , cleans up high and under furniture
